stories.original_headline: What you eat could decide the planet’s future
stories.original_summary: What we put on our plates may matter more for the climate than we realize. stories.fantasy_headline: Eating Habits Could Spell Fate for the Realm!
stories.fantasy_story: Wizards of the Elemental Circle warn that what folk feast upon greatly impacts the realm's balance. Many, especially in richer kingdoms, consume too much of certain foods. Large portions of dark meat alone generate immense magical imbalance, threatening our lands.

stories.original_headline: Scientists reverse Alzheimer’s in mice and restore memory
stories.original_summary: Alzheimer’s has long been considered irreversible, but new research challenges that assumption. stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Discover Cure for Memory-Sapping Curse!
stories.fantasy_story: For ages, the memory-sapping curse was thought eternal. But skilled Alchemists have found its secret: a fading of the mind's magical essence. By restoring this essence, they can mend even dire cases, as shown on small enchanted creatures, bringing back lost memories.

stories.fantasy_headline: Anker's Grand Portable Orb of Power Returns to Low Price!
stories.fantasy_story: After the bustling Winter Solstice Market, deals have been scarce for magical charging artifacts. Yet, Anker's esteemed Guild now offers their mighty Portable Orb of Power at a rare discount. You can find this powerful artifact at the Grand Trader's Outposts for eighty-seven gold coins.

stories.original_headline: Sony’s souped-up PlayStation 5 Pro is $100 off for the rest of today
stories.original_summary: Sony’s full suite of PlayStation 5 consoles jumped in price in August due to increased US tariffs, but now through Christmas, you can save $100 on several models. stories.fantasy_headline: Sony Clan's Grandest Scrying Pool Sees Price Drop!
stories.fantasy_story: The Sony Clan's arcane devices saw a price hike due to new kingdom tariffs. But now, for the duration of the Yule Festival, you can save a hundred gold coins. This grand discount applies especially to their potent PS5 Pro Scrying Pool, their most powerful viewing artifact.
